tab1.text1:
Hi and Welcome to our small but humble community!

I hope you like it here and enjoy your stay.

If you want to keep in touch with us or want any info regarding the server you got a Discord link right below

- Admins:Krognet,Shaull,Molle,Pepper
tab1.text2:
- Keep chat English/Swedish (Most of us are Swedish)
- Be respectful to other users both here and on Discord
- Listen to mods
- Dont be a dick to people you dont know personally
- Dont be racist, homophobic or sexist keep that to your friend group.
- Please take down traps when you are done
- Dont block any caves or explorer notes
- Please dont beg! 
- If you see anything or notice anything dont hesitate to contact any admin on our discord, there is a link below
tab1.text4:
WildDinoLvl=150
- Xp=3x
- Harvest=5x
- Taming=5x
- BabyMature=20x
- EggHatch=30x
- StackSize=50x

tab3.text1:
Watch out for the Enraged, or hunt them down.
These dinos have all the dangers of an Alpha, but worse.
They cannot be tamed, and they will be tough to conquer
but if you can do it, you (and your chibi) will reap the rewards.
(Bigger, stronger, tougher, faster.
Enraged kills drop special loot like kibble and also unlocks 1 random tek engram, kills will count towards chibi XP).
tab3.text2:
- Craft a Shiny Prod or Shiny Spear Bolts from Raw Essence, obtained from killing Enraged Shinies
- Use the Shiny Prod or Bolts on a wild Shiny Dino, and kill it within 60 seconds to extract its essence
- Essences can be applied to a dino of the same class (eg. both a Stego) to gain the Shiny buff
- You can combine two essence on a dino, following the same rules as wild spawning (one visual, one ability)
tab3.text3:
Shiny dinos can spawn with 1 or more special powers. 
They can be tamed just like a normal dino and they will keep their special powers when doing so. 
You can find a link to all the powers and what they do at the bottom.
